price: Hakika Sisi tutawapelekea ngamia jike ili kuwajaribu, basi watazame tu na ustahamili.
arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tunampelekea Mtume wetu Saleh ngamia mke, awe ni mtihani wao. Basi wangojee, na uwatazame watafanya nini. Na subiri, uvumilie maudhi yao mpaka itapo kuja amri ya Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā mur'silū al-nāqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-iṣ'ṭabir
